price: so that they may eat of its fruit that was not made by their hands[9]. Will they not then give thanks?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: [9] i.e., that which Allah has produced for them without labor on their part.
